WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for the suggestion.  We'll focus this issue tracker for TypeScript specific issues.
WorkItem.Description: It's a nice editor, could serve as a ground to build my own Typescript editor.
WorkItem.Summary: Please make available the Playground source code

Comments.Message: This would be great! It's a really nice editor, and even without the intellisense support (which is amazing) it would be great to be able to put one on my own project tracker.
